title: Sunak vows to ‘continue to confront difficult challenges’ as Parliament returns
description: A Downing Street source said the Prime Minister was determined to ‘not take the easy way out’ in a year that is likely to see a general election.

title: Keir Starmer says worrying about his children keeps him up at night
description: Keir Starmer has said he loses sleep worrying about the impact of his job on his two teenage children as his party prepares for government.

description: Starmer and his London-based team were defeated 14-8 during the match, which saw him ship two goals while playing between the sticks.

title: Keir Starmer kept up at night worrying about job’s impact on his family
description: The Labour leader said he wants to 'desperately try to protect' his two teenage children and keep them out of the public eye.

title: Sir Keir Starmer kept up at night worrying about job’s impact on his family
description: Sir Keir Starmer said he is kept up at night worrying about the impact of his job on his family. As the general election approaches, Sir Keir said he wants to “desperately try to protect” his two teenage children and keep them out of the public eye.

title: Keir Starmer must never be forgiven for using a spurious medieval loophole to put investigative journalism in the dock
description: SIR Keir Starmer has called on Scotland Yard to probe sex abuse claims against Prince Andrew. Many will agree the Duke of York has questions to answer about his relationship with billionaire paedophile Jeffrey Epstein and allegations of under-age sex orgies.

title: Communists welcome ongoing mass protests against Sunak and Starmer's moral bankruptcy on Gaza
description: THE Communist Party of Britain have welcomed the ongoing mass protests against the moral bankruptcy of politicians, including Prime Minister Rishi Sunak and Labour leader Sir Keir Starmer, who refuse to condemn Israeli war crimes in Gaza.

title: Khan caves in to unions over TfL strikes in 'foretaste' of Labour government
description: Sadiq Khan on Sunday night bowed to rail unions by offering a bumper pay deal to avoid London Underground strikes in what Boris Johnson said gave a “foretaste” of life under a Labour government.

title: Sunak says he wants to reduce workers’ taxes this year and may cut benefits
description: PM sets up possibility of income tax coming down in March and says control of welfare is a priority

title: Drawing up the battle lines at the start of an election year
description: Drawing up the battle lines at the start of an election year The two candidates for Prime Minister, Rishi Sunak and Sir Keir Starmer, have been outlining the policies they think will win them victory in an election.

title: Ministers call for former Post Office chief exec to lose CBE
description: Rishi Sunak is under pressure to intervene in the Post Office honours row as a petition calling for the former chief executive to lose her CBE approaches one million signatures.

title: Most memorable moments caught on camera in 2023
description: A number of memorable moments were caught on camera in 2023. The ECHO has made a compilation of some of the most shocking moments that were filmed last year. From Eurovision to shocking CCTV footage, they are here in this compilation for you to relive.

title: UK weather: Snow and ice as temperatures plunge below freezing in week-long cold snap
description: Britons can expect an overnight freeze on Sunday, forecasters have said. with temperatures dropping as low as -4C in parts of the country. Sleet and snow showers are due on Monday, with temperatures during the day struggling to get above 4C.

title: Esther Rantzen calls for people to back 'urgent' assisted dying petition
description: Dame Esther Rantzen today issues an impassioned plea to legalise assisted dying in Britain, saying: "For patients like me, it is urgent."

description: The Prime Minister said Britain’s welfare system ‘is not working’ and that he wants to ensure ‘everybody who can work does work’.
